days.title: Paris --> New York
days.content: The journey begins! After a lovely breakfast in Montmartre, we headed to CDG. The flight was long but smooth. Arrived in NYC just in time for a slice of pizza.

days.title: Exploring Brooklyn
days.content: Walked across the Brooklyn Bridge. The view of the skyline is breathtaking. Found a nice coffee shop in Dumbo.

days.title: Tokyo Arrival
days.content: Landed in Narita. Taken the express train to Shinjuku. The neon lights are overwhelming in the best way possible.
